name: code-server
desc: Run upstream VS Code on a remote machine with access through a modern web browser from any device, anywhere.

options.name: connectionToken
options.desc: A secret that must be included with all requests.

options.name: connectionTokenFile
options.desc: Path to a file that contains the connection token.

options.name: extensionsDir
options.desc: Set the root path for extensions.

options.name: extraArguments
options.desc: Additional arguments to pass to openvscode-server.

options.name: extraEnvironment
options.desc: Additional environment variables to pass to openvscode-server.

options.name: extraGroups
options.desc: An array of additional groups for the  openvscode-server user.

options.name: extraPackages
options.desc: Additional packages to add to the openvscode-server  PATH .

options.name: group
options.desc: The group to run openvscode-server under. By default, a group named openvscode-server  will be created.

options.name: host
options.desc: The host name or IP address the server should listen to.

options.name: port
options.desc: The port the server should listen to. If 0 is passed a random freeport is picked. If a range in the format num-num is passed, a free portfrom the range (end inclusive) is selected.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: serverDataDir
options.desc: Specifies the directory that server data is kept in.

options.name: socketPath
options.desc: The path to a socket file for the server to listen to.

options.name: telemetryLevel
options.desc: Sets the initial telemetry level. Valid levels are: ‘off’, ‘crash’,‘error’ and ‘all’.

options.name: user
options.desc: The user to run openvscode-server as. By default, a user named openvscode-server  will be created.

options.name: userDataDir
options.desc: Specifies the directory that user data is kept in. Can be used toopen multiple distinct instances of Code.

options.name: withoutConnectionToken
options.desc: Run without a connection token. Only use this if the connection issecured by other means.
